SELECT DISTINCT item.item_uuid AS itemUuid, item.submit_number AS submitNumber, item.update_time AS submitTime, item.user_type AS userType, an.form_key AS formKey, ef.title AS title, IF(item.user_type = 'student', stu.real_name, tch.real_name) AS submitName, IF(item.user_type = 'student', cla.class_name, '') AS classes, IF(an.audit_id IS NOT NULL, TRUE, FALSE) AS auditStatus, IF(an.audit_id IS NOT NULL , fa.is_through , FALSE ) AS passed FROM event_form_audit_notice AS an INNER JOIN event_form_item AS item ON item.item_uuid = an.item_uuid INNER JOIN event_form AS ef ON ef.form_key = item.form_key LEFT JOIN event_form_audit AS fa on fa.id=an.audit_id LEFT JOIN user_student AS stu ON stu.stu_number = item.submit_number LEFT JOIN user_teacher AS tch ON tch.tch_number = item.submit_number LEFT JOIN entity_classes AS cla ON cla.id = stu.classes_id WHERE an.reviewer_number = '${number}' AND an.reviewer_type = '${type}' AND an.form_key = '${formKey}'
AND an.audit_id IS NULL
AND (an.audit_id IS NOT NULL AND fa.is_through = 0)
AND (an.audit_id IS NOT NULL AND fa.is_through = 1)

SELECT an.*, fa.* FROM event_form_audit_notice AS an LEFT JOIN event_form_audit AS fa ON fa.id = an.audit_id WHERE an.form_key = '${formKey}' AND an.item_uuid = '${uuid}' AND an.reviewer_number = '${reviewerNumber}' AND an.reviewer_type = '${reviewerType}' ORDER BY an.create_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM event_form_audit_notice AS an WHERE an.item_uuid = '${uuid}' ORDER BY an.create_time DESC LIMIT 1
